description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Grab some friends and play Ava Bash, a compilation of six button bashing games that will see who is the master of the control pad in your house. Includes a free bonus game.
description.short: Grab some friends and play Ava Bash, a compilation of six button bashing games that will see who is the master of the control pad in your house. Includes a free bonus game.
